experience: You and Richard both know Kimberlie Cerrone, Brad Tritle, and 7 others
You both worked at EPIC Research and Diagnostics
Richard worked at EPIC Research and Diagnostics after you started
Steward and grow the resources of the TFT.

EPIC Research & Diagnostics is a privately held company that has developed an innovative method of measuring and analyzing physiological status of various organs and systems in the body through the non-invasive technique of Evoked Photon Image Capture (EPIC).  The company, which was founded in 2006, has an impressive database of more than 1,000,000 captured images, more than $18M invested, and a decade of algorithm development, testing, and validation, and is now ready to commercialize this innovative, proprietary technology.  The objective, individualized data measured and the evidence-based recommendations produced by EPIC’s products may enable people, scanned with EPIC’s technology, to achieve greater levels of health and wellbeing.

The Prevent Clinic is a “proof of concept” startup company that provides monitoring and management services of patients diagnosed with heart failure, hypertension, and dyspnea.  The Prevent Clinic is demonstrating that when physicians appropriately utilize objective cardiac, hemodynamic, fluid, and respiratory data to guide therapeutic management of selected patients, these patients have better outcomes and lower costs of care.  Analysis of data on the first 65 heart failure patients revealed a significant reduction in expected 30-day readmission rates, lower cost of care, as well as a favorable return on investment for the contracting facilities.  (Manuscripts detailing methodology, results, and conclusions are in process.)
Business Development Consultant - Cardiology and Telemedicine

Cardio Renal Technologies Inc., founded in 2013, is a privately held telemedicine and medical device company with offices in Rye, NY and San Diego, CA. We are exclusively focused on bringing smart, timely and patient-centered solutions to augment medical management of dialysis treatments and dialysis related cardiac events as result of fluid overload .  Mission:  Decrease hospital admissions/re-admissions, reduce costs and improve patient outcomes by eliminating fluid level complications during and between dialysis sessions

REACH Health is a technology company specialized in developing and providing interactive physician-to-patient access. Our telemedicine system makes it possible for physicians to assess and provide treatment options using live video and on-demand patient medical data.  In time critical situations, we overcome traditional obstacles of distance and time by connecting physicians and patients with multidiscipline acute care capabilities.

Craig was our lead Software Developer at EPIC Research & Diagnostics.  Not only was the quality of his work excellent, but he completed several projects ahead of schedule, which enabling us to add additional features in to a release.  Additionally, he recommended and managed another software engineer, demonstrating good selection and managerial skills.  He was well-liked and respected by all in the company.  I highly recommend Craig as a software developer.

I had the privilege of hiring Will for his first job in medical device sales and watching him grow professionally from an inexperienced rookie to becoming one of the best sales representatives in the company. The foundation of his success as a sales representative at Quinton was his commitment to excellence and an outstanding work ethic. He quickly obtained the clinical knowledge required to understand the needs of prospect, as well as the product (technical) knowledge to understand how our products met their needs. His organizational skills and self-discipline helped him manage a large geography effectively and efficiently. As a result of his professionalism and commitment to excellence, Will earned the respect and trust of his customers and colleagues.
